Posts.Content:
Susan:
Thanks for the note. The way I understand it, my cancer is in my lymph nodes on my lung, so no surgery for me. But stories of encouragement like yours are most welcome. I did hook up with a woman through the wellness community via phone. Her cancer metatsised to her liver and her drs. were giving her death sentences a few years ago. She is on the same treatment I am on, Flaslodex, and is doing well.
Thanks again for responding to my post and keep doing GREAT!!!
Posts.Title: Reocurrance Now stage 4 Breast Cancer -

Posts.Content: Thanks for everyone who posted to me.Â  I really appreciate it.
